channel.title: publications on Fink broker
channel.description: Recent content in publications on Fink broker

item.title: Publications
item.description: List of publications from the Fink collaboration and the larger astronomy community that uses Fink public data. 2024 Multidatabase, the Future of the data storage in Particle Physics and Astronomy, Julius Hrivnác, Julien Peloton Transient Classifiers for Fink: Benchmarks for LSST, B.M.O. Fraga, C.R. Bom, A. Santos, E. Russeil, M. Leoni, J. Peloton, E.E.O. Ishida, A. Möller, S. Blondin Combined spin orientation and phase function of asteroids, B.
